statements: DELETE FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE id = 1;

DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor';
DELETE FROM land_cover_results WHERE id = 10 OR classification_result = 'Forest';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' AND sensor_type = 'Outdoor';

DELETE FROM land_cover_classification WHERE confidence < 0.5;
DELETE FROM land_cover_classification WHERE id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4c6e';
DELETE FROM satellite_images WHERE image_date > '2022-01-01' AND image_resolution > 0.5;
DELETE FROM land_cover_classes WHERE class_id = 1;
DELETE FROM data_sources WHERE source_name = 'Satellite Imagery';
DELETE FROM land_cover_results WHERE result_id = 100 AND coverage_area > 50.5;
DELETE FROM remote_sensing_data WHERE data_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND location_name = 'Forest';
